Detailed Description

Interface for the Flock of Birds tracker.

The Flock of Birds (FOB) delivers 6DOF data from a tracker (their) with real-time rates. The bird needs a specific hemisphere to operate, and it needs to be positionned in this hemisphere at startup to function correctly.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Hemisphere
 

This type represents hemispheres of the FOB magnetic transmitter.
